Package org.threadly.concurrent

These are tools to assist in writing well performing and safe concurrent java code.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
PriorityScheduledExecutor.TaskAcceptor Interface for an implementation which can accept consumed tasks.
PrioritySchedulerInterface This interface represents schedulers which can not only execute and schedule tasks, but run based off a given priority as well.
SimpleSchedulerInterface A simple thread pool that accepts scheduling.
 

Class Summary
CallableDistributor<K,R> This abstraction is designed to make submitting callable tasks with results easier.
CallableDistributor.Result<R> Result from a callable which can be either a computed result, or an exception due to failure.
ClockWrapper This is a small wrapper class for Clock to avoid updating for bulk calls.
ConcurrentSimpleSchedulerWrapper This is a wrapper for the java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor to use that implementation with the SimpleSchedulerInterface.
PriorityScheduledExecutor Executor to run tasks, schedule tasks.
PriorityScheduledExecutor.OneTimeFutureTaskWrapper<T> Wrapper for tasks which only executes once, and also implements the Future interface.
PriorityScheduledExecutor.OneTimeTaskWrapper Wrapper for tasks which only executes once.
PriorityScheduledExecutor.TaskWrapper Abstract implementation for all tasks handled by this pool.
PriorityScheduledExecutorServiceWrapper This is a wrapper for PriorityScheduledExecutor to be a drop in replacement for any ScheduledExecutorService (aka the ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor interface).
PrioritySchedulerWrapper Class to wrap any implementation of PrioritySchedulerInterface.
RunnableChain A class to chain multiple runnables and thus run them all in the same thread.
TaskExecutorDistributor TaskDistributor is designed to take a multi threaded pool and add tasks with a given key such that those tasks will be run single threaded for any given key.
TaskSchedulerDistributor This is a class which is more full featured than TaskExecutorDistributor, but it does require a scheduler implementation in order to be able to perform scheduling.
VirtualCallable<T> This class helps assist in making concurrent code testable.
VirtualRunnable This class helps assist in making concurrent code testable.
 

Enum Summary
PriorityScheduledExecutor.TaskType Behavior for task after it finishes completion.
TaskPriority Priority for tasks given to a thread pool.
 

Package org.threadly.concurrent Description

These are tools to assist in writing well performing and safe concurrent java code. These are a complement to tools provided by java.util.concurrent.
